relationships.description: The hawthorn wand was being held by Harry Potter.
Crabbe and Goyle were standing shoulder to shoulder behind Harry.
Draco Malfoy was accusing Harry Potter of holding his wand.
Crabbe and Goyle were pointing their wands at Harry.
Harry Potter was holding onto the hawthorn wand tightly.
